|

The following non-standard {{domxref("DataTransfer")}} members have been removed (Firefox bug 1345192):

|
    > |
  • {{domxref("DataTransfer.mozItemCount")}}
    • ^ |
  • {{domxref("DataTransfer.mozClearDataAt()")}}
    • |
  • {{domxref("DataTransfer.mozGetDataAt()")}}

title: Firefox 71 for Developers
summary: This article provides information about the changes in Firefox 71 that will affect developers. Firefox 71 was released on December 3, 2019.
